data.name: Coilfang Elite
data.text: After a Spellcraft minion appears in Bob's Tavern, get a copy of its spell.
data.textGolden: After a Spellcraft minion appears in Bob's Tavern, get 2 copies of its spell.

data.name: Enhance-o Medico
data.text: Minions in Bob's Tavern with Taunt, Reborn, Windfury, or Divine Shield have +2/+2 for each.
data.textGolden: Minions in Bob's Tavern with Taunt, Reborn, Windfury, or Divine Shield have +4/+4 for each.

data.name: Flight Trainer
data.text: Your flightpaths trigger twice.
data.textGolden: Your flightpaths trigger three times.

data.name: Lei Flamepaw
data.text: 'Power of the Storm' offers 3 options instead of 2.
data.textGolden: 'Power of the Storm' offers 4 options instead of 2.

data.name: Mawsworn Soulkeeper
data.text: Deathrattle: Summon 3 random Tier 1 minions.
data.textGolden: Deathrattle: Summon 6 random Tier 1 minions.

data.name: Pigeon Lord
data.text: Your Refreshes cost (0) while Bob's Tavern doesn't have the minion type of your Hero Power.
data.textGolden: Your Refreshes cost (0) while Bob's Tavern doesn't have the minion type of your Hero Power.

data.name: SI:7 Scout
data.text: After you buy a minion, gain +1/+1.
data.textGolden: After you buy a minion, gain +2/+2.

data.name: Apostle of Galakrond
data.text: Battlecry: Replace minions in Bob's Tavern with ones of a higher Tavern Tier.
data.textGolden: Battlecry: Replace minions in Bob's Tavern with ones of a higher Tavern Tier twice.

data.name: Asher the Haberdasher
data.text: After you sell a minion, gain a +1/+1 hat that passes to a friendly minion when sold.
data.textGolden: After you sell a minion, gain two +1/+1 hats that passes to a friendly minion when sold.

data.name: Baby Elekk
data.text: After you play a minion with Attack equal to its Health, gain +2/+2.
data.textGolden: After you play a minion with Attack equal to its Health, gain +4/+4.

data.name: Crazy Monkey
data.text: After you feed a minion a Banana, give it +1/+1.
data.textGolden: After you feed a minion a Banana, give it +2/+2.

data.name: Dagwik Stickytoe
data.text: At the end of your turn, give a random friendly Golden minion +5/+5.
data.textGolden: At the end of your turn, give a random friendly Golden minion +10/+10.

data.name: Eclipsion Illidari
data.text: Your first minion that attacks has "Immune while Attacking" for one attack only.
data.textGolden: Your first two minions that attack have "Immune while Attacking" for one attack only.

data.name: Jandice's Apprentice
data.text: After you swap minions, give them stats equal to your Tavern Tier.
data.textGolden: After you swap minions, give them stats equal to your Tavern Tier twice.

data.name: Karl the Lost
data.text: After you use your Hero Power, give your Divine Shield minions +2 Attack.
data.textGolden: After you use your Hero Power, give your Divine Shield minions +4 Attack.

data.name: Many Whelps
data.text: Whenever you summon a Whelp, gain +2/+2 permanently.
data.textGolden: Whenever you summon a Whelp, gain +4/+4 permanently.

data.name: Nightmare Ectoplasm
data.text: When you 'Devour' this, spit its stats onto 2 extra minions.
data.textGolden: When you 'Devour' this, spit its stats onto 4 extra minions.

data.name: Sous Chef
data.text: You can use your Hero Power an extra time each turn.
data.textGolden: You can use your Hero Power 2 extra times each turn.

data.name: Spirit Raptor
data.text: After you call upon a new Element, this remembers it. Deathrattle: Call upon those Elements.
data.textGolden: After you call upon a new Element, this remembers it. Deathrattle: Call upon those Elements twice.

data.name: Sr. Tomb Diver
data.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Make your right-most minion Golden.
data.textGolden: Taunt Deathrattle: Make your two right-most minions Golden.

data.name: Tamuzo
data.text: Avenge (2): Upgrade 'Tentacular' by +1/+1.
data.textGolden: Avenge (2): Upgrade 'Tentacular' by +2/+2.

data.name: Tentacle of C'Thun
data.text: After a different friendly minion gains stats, gain +1/+1 until your next turn.
data.textGolden: After a different friendly minion gains stats, gain +2/+2 until your next turn.

data.name: Veranus, Stormlord's Mount
data.text: At the end of your turn, transform the minion to the left of this into one from a tier higher (up to Tier 7!)
data.textGolden: At the end of your turn, transform the minion to the left of this into one from two tiers higher (up to Tier 7!)

data.name: Watfin
data.text: After you guess correctly with 'Detective for Hire', get a plain copy of the minion.
data.textGolden: After you guess correctly with 'Detective for Hire', get 2 plain copies of the minion.

data.name: Akali, Rock Rhino
data.text: At the end of every 2 turns, get a plain copy of the left-most card in your hand.
data.textGolden: At the end of every turn, get a plain copy of the left-most card in your hand.

data.name: Arfus
data.text: After a friendly minion is Reborn, give it this minion's Attack.
data.textGolden: After a friendly minion is Reborn, give it this minion's Attack twice.

data.name: Bilgewater Mogul
data.text: Choose One - Give a minion +1 Attack for each Gold you've spent this turn; or +1 Health.
data.textGolden: Choose One - Give a minion +2 Attack for each Gold you've spent this turn; or +2 Health.

data.name: Brann's Epic Egg
data.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon and get a random Battlecry minion.
data.textGolden: Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon and get 2 random Battlecry minions.

data.name: Frostwolf Lieutenant
data.text: Avenge (2): Minions in Bob's Tavern have +1 Attack for the rest of the game.
data.textGolden: Avenge (2): Minions in Bob's Tavern have +2 Attack for the rest of the game.

data.name: Icesnarl the Mighty
data.text: After a friendly minion kills an enemy, gain +1 Health permanently.
data.textGolden: After a friendly minion kills an enemy, gain +2 Health permanently.

data.name: Jr. Navigator
data.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of 'Lead Explorer' by (2).
data.textGolden: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of 'Lead Explorer' by (4).

data.name: Kil'rek
data.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Add a random Demon to your hand.
data.textGolden: Taunt Deathrattle: Add 2 random Demons to your hand.

data.name: Lil' K.T.
data.text: At the start of your turn, get a plain minion from your lowest Health opponent's warband.
data.textGolden: At the start of your turn, get 2 plain minions from your lowest Health opponent's warband.

data.name: Living Nightmare
data.text: After you buy a minion, minions in Bob's Tavern have +2/+1 this turn.
data.textGolden: After you buy a minion, minions in Bob's Tavern have +4/+2 this turn.

data.name: Loyal Henchman
data.text: After you kill a second minion each combat, get a plain copy of it.
data.textGolden: After you kill a second minion each combat,  get 2 plain copies of it.

data.name: Shadow Warden
data.text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power makes the target Golden.
data.textGolden: Battlecry: Your next 2 Hero Powers make the target Golden.

data.name: Shady Aristocrat
data.text: When you sell this, Discover a Quest. Complete it to get an 8-Gold Coin Pouch.
data.textGolden: When you sell this, Discover a Quest. Complete it to get an 16-Gold Coin Pouch.

data.name: Sklibb, Demon Hunter
data.text: After you buy a card, your next Refresh costs (0).
data.textGolden: After you buy a card, your next two Refreshes cost (0).

data.name: Snack Vendor
data.text: At the end of your turn, give your Tier 3 minions +1/+2.
data.textGolden: At the end of your turn, give your Tier 3 minions +2/+4.

data.name: Solemn Serenader
data.text: After you use your Hero Power on a minion, it gains half this minion's Attack. (Swaps to Health next turn!)
data.textGolden: After you use your Hero Power on a minion, it gains this minion's Attack. (Swaps to Health next turn!)

data.name: Sparkfin Soothsayer
data.text: Battlecry: Transform minions in Bob's Tavern into Murlocs of the same Tavern Tier.
data.textGolden: Battlecry: Transform minions in Bob's Tavern into Murlocs of a higher Tavern Tier.

data.name: Spirit of Air
data.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion Windfury,    Divine Shield, and Taunt.
data.textGolden: Deathrattle: Give 2 random friendly minions Windfury, Divine Shield, and Taunt.

data.name: Stormpike Lieutenant
data.text: Avenge (2): Minions in Bob's Tavern have +1 Health for the rest of the game.
data.textGolden: Avenge (2): Minions in Bob's Tavern have +2 Health for the rest of the game.

data.name: Street Magician
data.text: At the end of your turn, cast a random Secret.
data.textGolden: At the end of your turn, cast 2 random Secrets.

data.name: Thawed Champion
data.text: At the end of your turn, add a random Frozen minion from Bob's Tavern to your hand.
data.textGolden: At the end of your turn, add 2 random Frozen minions from Bob's Tavern to your hand.

data.name: Varden's Aquarrior
data.text: 'Twice as Nice' also gives both minions stats equal to your Tavern Tier.
data.textGolden: 'Twice as Nice' also gives both minions stats equal   to your Tavern Tier twice.

data.name: Warden Thelwater
data.text: At the start of your turn, add your next opponent's Buddy to your hand.
data.textGolden: At the start of your turn, add 2 of your next opponent's Buddy to your hand.

data.name: Weebomination
data.text: Battlecry: Give a minion +1 Health for each Health your hero is missing.
data.textGolden: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Health for each Health your hero is missing.

data.name: Baby N'Zoth
data.text: Battlecry: Make a friendly Deathrattle minion Golden.
data.textGolden: Battlecry: Make all friendly Deathrattle minions Golden.

data.name: Baby Y'Shaarj
data.text: Whenever you summon a minion of your current Tavern Tier, give it +4/+4.
data.textGolden: Whenever you summon a minion of your current Tavern Tier, give it +8/+8.

data.name: Barov's Apprentice
data.text: After you play a Coin, gain 1 Gold.
data.textGolden: After you play a Coin, gain 2 Gold.

data.name: Burth
data.text: Whenever you Discover a minion, give it +4/+4 and upgrade this by +1/+1.
data.textGolden: Whenever you Discover a minion, give it +8/+8 and upgrade this by +2/+2.

data.name: Captain Fairmount
data.text: Choose One - 'Conviction' gives an additional +2 Attack for the rest of the game; or +2 Health.
data.textGolden: Choose One - 'Conviction' gives an additional +4 Attack for the rest of the game; or +4 Health.

data.name: Chromie
data.text: Minions in Bob's Tavern have +1/+1 for each time it was Refreshed this turn.
data.textGolden: Minions in Bob's Tavern have +2/+2 for each time it was Refreshed this turn.

data.name: Crabby
data.text: After your Hero Power fires, give adjacent minions stats   equal to the damage dealt.
data.textGolden: After your Hero Power fires, give adjacent minions stats equal to twice the damage dealt.

data.name: Crimson Hand Centurion
data.text: After 'Verdant Spheres' triggers, give your hand and board +1/+1.
data.textGolden: After 'Verdant Spheres' triggers, give your hand and board +2/+2.

data.name: Elder Taggawag
data.text: Start of Combat: If you control 4 minions with different types, gain your minions' highest Attack and Health.
data.textGolden: Start of Combat: If you control 4 minions with different types, gain double your minions' highest Attack and Health..

data.name: Elementium Squirrel Bomb
data.text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy minion for each of your Mechs that died this combat.
data.textGolden: Deathrattle: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion for each of your Mechs that died this combat.

data.name: Faceless One
data.text: When you sell this, get the Buddy of your teammate's Hero Power.
data.textGolden: When you sell this, get 2 Buddies of your teammate's Hero Power.

data.name: Festergut
data.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random Undead Creation.
data.textGolden: Deathrattle: Summon 2 random Undead Creations.

data.name: Halfus the Mighty
data.text: At the start of your turn, Discover a minion of your Tier. (50% chance to Pass it!)
data.textGolden: At the start of your turn, Discover 2 minions of your Tier. (50% chance to Pass it!)

data.name: Halfus the Wise
data.text: At the start of your turn, Discover a Tavern spell of your Tier. (50% chance to Pass it!)
data.textGolden: At the start of your turn, Discover 2 Tavern spells of your Tier. (50% chance to Pass it!)

data.name: Hunter of Old
data.text: At the start of your turn, add your last opponent's Buddy to your hand.
data.textGolden: At the start of your turn, add 2 of your last opponent's Buddy to your hand.

data.name: Lucifron
data.text: Your end of turn effects trigger an extra time.
data.textGolden: Your end of turn effects trigger 2 extra times.

data.name: Maxwell, Mighty Steed
data.text: When you sell this, get the Buddy of your Hero Power.
data.textGolden: When you sell this, get 2 Buddies of your Hero Power.

data.name: Mishmash
data.text: Whenever your Amalgam gains stats, this gains them too.
data.textGolden: Whenever your Amalgam gains stats, this gains them twice.

data.name: Monstrosity
data.text: After a friendly minion dies, gain its Attack.
data.textGolden: After a friendly minion dies, gain its Attack twice.

data.name: Nexus Lord
data.text: 'Arcane Alteration' replaces with a card from one Tier higher.
data.textGolden: 'Arcane Alteration' replaces with a card from two Tiers higher.

data.name: Phyresz
data.text: When you sell this, Discover a plain copy of a different minion that you have exactly one of.
data.textGolden: When you sell this, Discover a plain copy of a different minion that you have exactly one of twice.

data.name: Sinestra
data.text: Whenever a friendly minion gains Attack during combat, give it +1 Health permanently.
data.textGolden: Whenever a friendly minion gains Attack during combat, give it +2 Health permanently.

data.name: Snow Elemental
data.text: Bob always offers an extra Frozen Elemental whenever the Tavern is Refreshed.
data.textGolden: Bob always offers 2 extra Frozen Elementals whenever the Tavern is Refreshed.

data.name: Titanic Guardian
data.text: Whenever a different friendly minion gains Health, this gains it too.
data.textGolden: Whenever a different friendly minion gains Health, this gains twice that amount.

data.name: Unearthed Underling
data.text: Whenever your hero takes damage, rewind it and gain stats equal to that amount.
data.textGolden: Whenever your hero takes damage, rewind it and gain stats equal to double that amount.

data.name: Valithria Dreamwalker
data.text: Whenever a Dragon enters your warband or the Tavern, gain +1/+1.
data.textGolden: Whenever a Dragon enters your warband or the Tavern, gain +2/+2.

data.name: Waxadred, the Drippy
data.text: Battlecry: Refresh Bob's Tavern with the highest Tier minion from each opponent's warband.
data.textGolden: Battlecry: Refresh Bob's Tavern with the highest Tier minion from each opponent's warband.

data.name: Acolyte of Yogg-Saron
data.text: At the start of every turn, spin the Wheel of Yogg-Saron.
data.textGolden: At the start of every turn, spin the Wheel of Yogg-Saron and double its effect.

data.name: Baby Kodo
data.text: Battlecry: Refresh Bob's Tavern with a minion of each Tavern Tier.
data.textGolden: Battlecry: Refresh Bob's Tavern with a minion of each Tavern Tier.

data.name: Clockwork Assistant
data.text: Battlecry: Discover a minion from a higher Tavern Tier.
data.textGolden: Battlecry: Discover two minions from a higher Tavern Tier.

data.name: Dranosh Saurfang
data.text: After you buy a minion, gain its stats.
data.textGolden: After you buy a minion, gain double its stats.

data.name: Evergreen Botani
data.text: At the end of your turn, add a random minion of your  Tavern Tier to your hand.
data.textGolden: At the end of your turn, add 2 random minions of your  Tavern Tier to your hand.

data.name: Lantern Tender
data.text: At the end of your turn, get 2 'Lantern Lights' that give a minion stats equal to your Tier.
data.textGolden: At the end of your turn, get 4 'Lantern Lights' that give a minion stats equal to your Tier.

data.name: Magnus Manastorm
data.text: After you buy a minion, add one of the same Tavern Tier to Bob's Tavern.
data.textGolden: After you buy a minion, add two of the same Tavern Tier to Bob's Tavern.

data.name: Mister Chu
data.text: Once per turn, after you Pass a minion, get a plain copy of it (except Buddies).
data.textGolden: Once per turn, after you Pass a minion, get 2 plain copies of it (except Buddies).

data.name: Muckslinger
data.text: Battlecry: Get a random Battlecry minion.
data.textGolden: Battlecry: Get 2 random Battlecry minions.

data.name: Raging Contender
data.text: After you use 'Trash for Treasure', gain Gold equal to the removed minion's Tavern Tier.
data.textGolden: After you use 'Trash for Treasure', gain Gold equal to twice the removed minion's Tavern Tier.

data.name: Reliquary Attendant
data.text: Once per turn, after you cast a Tavern spell, get a new copy of it.
data.textGolden: Once per turn, after you cast a Tavern spell, get 2 new copies of it.

data.name: Shadowy Construct
data.text: Deathrattle: Give this minion's maximum stats stats to another friendly minion.
data.textGolden: Deathrattle: Give this minion's maximum stats stats to another friendly minion, twice.

data.name: Sharkbait
data.text: Battlecry: Refresh your Hero Power.
data.textGolden: Battlecry: Refresh your Hero Power.

data.name: Shining Sailor
data.text: After you buy 2 Pirates, gain +1/+1 and add a Pirate to the Tavern.
data.textGolden: After you buy 2 Pirates, gain +2/+2 and add a Pirate to the Tavern.

data.name: Sub Scrubber
data.text: After you play a Mech, gain +2/+2.
data.textGolden: After you play a Mech, gain +4/+4.

data.name: Submersible Chef
data.text: Battlecry: Add a random Tier 1, 3, and 5 minion to your hand.
data.textGolden: Battlecry: Add a random Tier 1, 3, and 5 minion to your hand twice.

data.name: Talent Scout
data.text: Battlecry: Make a Buddy Golden.
data.textGolden: Battlecry: Make two Buddies Golden.

data.name: Ticket Collector
data.text: When you sell this, Discover a Darkmoon Prize from the next Tier.
data.textGolden: When you sell this, Discover 2 Darkmoon Prizes from the next Tier.

data.name: Tuskarr Raider
data.text: Battlecry: Give a minion +1/+1 for each Pirate you played this game.
data.textGolden: Battlecry: Give a minion +2/+2 for each Pirate you played this game.

data.name: Vaelastrasz
data.text: Battlecry and Start of Combat: Give your other minions +3/+3.
data.textGolden: Battlecry and Start of Combat: Give your other minions +6/+6.

data.name: Wandering Treant
data.text: Whenever a friendly Taunt minion is attacked, give your minions +1 Attack permanently.
data.textGolden: Whenever a friendly Taunt minion is attacked, give your minions +2 Attack permanently.

data.name: Box Cars
data.text: At the start of your turn, roll a 6-sided die. Discover a Tavern spell of that Tier.
data.textGolden: At the start of your turn, roll two 6-sided die. Discover a Tavern spell from each of those Tiers.

data.name: Death's Head Sage
data.text: After you get a Blood Gem, get an extra one.
data.textGolden: After you get a Blood Gem, get two extra.

data.name: Glorious Gloopling
data.text: At the start of your turn, get a plain copy of your teammate's highest-Tier minion (except Buddies).
data.textGolden: At the start of your turn, get 2 plain copies of your teammate's highest-Tier minion (except Buddies).

data.name: Imperial Defender
data.text: Whenever you cast a Spellcraft spell on a different friendly minion, you also cast it on this.
data.textGolden: Whenever you cast a Spellcraft spell on a different friendly minion, you also cast it on this twice.

data.name: Master Gadrin
data.text: Minions targeted by 'Spirit Swap' also gain each other's Health.
data.textGolden: Minions targeted by 'Spirit Swap' also gain double each other's Health.

data.name: Nathanos Blightcaller
data.text: Battlecry: Remove a friendly minion. Give its stats to its neighbors.
data.textGolden: Battlecry: Remove a friendly minion. Give double its stats to its neighbors.

data.name: Piloted Whirl-O-Tron
data.text: Start of Combat: Copy all other friendly minions' Deathrattles (except Piloted Whirl-o-Tron).
data.textGolden: Start of Combat: Copy all other friendly minions' Deathrattles, twice (except Piloted Whirl-o-Tron).

data.name: The Nine Frogs
data.text: After you buy a minion, get a random Tavern spell from the same Tier. (9 left!)
data.textGolden: After you buy a minion, get 2 random Tavern spells from the same Tier. (9 left!)
